title: Voyager may have suffered hack, data leak during reopened withdrawal period
description:
Bloomberg reported Aug. 1, that bankrupt crypto firm Voyager may have fallen victim to a cyber attack when withdrawals were briefly reopened for users, That report cited Voyager lawyer Darren Azman, who said the firm allowed customers to withdraw their assets for 30 days amidst bankruptcy proceedings. Customers withdrew $490 million, or 80% of possible […]

The post Voyager may have suffered hack, data leak during reopened withdrawal period appeared first on CryptoSlate.
